ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It's an advanced course that has Syntax I as a prerequisite for understanding the topics in it. It is a great course to take if you're interested in learning Syntax, and reading some original literature in the most important topics that have been researched in the last 50 years. It will bring more questions than answers, which is always good if you want to do research in the future.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I truly benefited from this course, since it allowed me to better understand some of the topics that are current research problems in Syntax. Moreover, the knowledge I gain is the basis to understand and try to do research in topics that are more complicated.
